meanings.definition: In a manner that produces a low, guttural sound like that of an angry dog.
meanings.sent1: The dog barked growlingly at the stranger.
meanings.sent2: The bear growled growlingly as a warning.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed growlingly when it saw the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: The engine rumbled growlingly as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent5: The thunder growled growlingly in the distance, signaling an approaching storm.
